description.en: A gag manga written by Hanabana Tsubomi. It features numerous characters from various TYPE-MOON works in a school setting.

title.en: S-Rank Party wo Munou da to Tsuihousareta kedo, "Kantei" to "Chiyu Mahou" de Nariagari Musou

altTitles.ja: Sランクパーティーを無能だと追放されたけど、【鑑定】と【治癒魔法】で成り上がり無双

altTitles.en: I Was Kicked out of an S-Rank Party for Being Incompetent, but I Became a Warrior With "Appraisal" and "Healing Magic"

description.en:
Nigris, an adventurer who has a rare "appraisal" skill and specializes in "healing magic." He supported the S-rank party behind the scenes, but was deemed incompetent and exiled. Nigris begins his career as a solo adventurer with a fresh start, but his destiny begins to change when he meets the elf slave girl Fels and the thunder master Alisa. "Wha, what is this power...!" Nigris' talent blooms, and they demonstrate incredible power! Together with his trusted companions, Nigris will make a name for himself as an adventurer. Nigris and his friends, who are unrivaled with unstoppable momentum that surpasses even S-rank parties, eventually get involved in a riot that threatens the country!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2881ha/)

“Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
description.fr: Les "chimères" sont des personnes auxquelles on a infusé de l'ADN animal afin de leur donner des superpouvoirs et des capacités, mais la société ne les favorise pas, si bien qu'elles vivent dans la peur et le rejet. Notre personnage principal, dont le nom de code est "01", travaille comme un mercenaire qui tombe sur une vieille connaissance. Il est ensuite chargé de protéger et de transporter Enoch, une fille qui est recherchée pour être le "matériel" parfait, jusqu'aux frontières du Canada.
description.pt: “Quimeras” são pessoas que foram infundidas com DNA animal para receber superpoderes e habilidades, mas a sociedade os despreza e vivem marginalizados. Nosso protagonista, codinome “01”, trabalha como um mercenário e recebe a missão de proteger e levar Enoch, o “material” perfeito, à fronteira do Canadá.

title.en: TSUYOSHI - Daremo Katenai, Aitsu ni wa

altTitles.ja: TSUYOSHI 誰も勝てない、アイツには

altTitles.en: TSUYOSHI: The One Who No One Can Win Against

altTitles.th: Tsuyoshi ไอ้หนุ่มหมัดพิฆาตลูกป๋องแป๋ง

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.
description.ja: “最強”を求めた者が必ず行きつく人物。　その名は「TSUYOSHI」。　「最強」ということ以外、謎に包まれた彼は一体何者なのか――！？

altTitles.ja: マギクラフト・マイスター

description.en:
There is only one Magi Craft Meister in the world. After the death of the last Meister over one thousand years ago, Jin Nidou was transported to another world in order to succeed her will.

After obtaining the knowledge of the Magi Craft Meister, Jin attempts to use a warp gate but it malfunctions, transporting him to an unknown world. Along with that, an automata he recently restored also uses the warp gate in order to search for her “father”. Thus, the crafting journey of the new Magi Craft Meister begins!
description.ja: 異世界に召喚された二堂仁は、世界でただひとりの魔法工学師（マギクラフト・マイスター）の後継者に指名された。先代の知識、研究所にある素材すべてを受け継いだ仁は地球の知識も使い、異世界でモノ作りで人を幸せにしようと奮闘する。

title.en: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi

altTitles.ja: これからだんだん幸せになっていく怖い 女上司

altTitles.ar: رئيسة مرعبة تزداد سعادة وسعادة من الآن فصاعدًا

altTitles.ja-ro: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Korekara Dondon Shiawase ni Natte iku Kowai Jōshi

altTitles.en: A Scary Boss, But From Now on She's Going to Be Happier and Happier

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.ar: مديرتي مخيفة للغايه، لكن من الأن وصاعدًا سأبذل قصارى جهدي لجعلها الأسعد.
description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

title.en: The Strange Adventure of a Broke Mercenary

altTitles.ja: 食い詰め傭兵の幻想奇譚
Fantasie Geshichte von soldner in groBer Armut

altTitles.en: The Strange Fantasy Story Of A Broke Mercenary

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวการผจญภัยสุดประหลาดของนายทหารถังแตก

altTitles.de: Fantasie Geschichte eines Söldners in Armut

description.en:
After the soldiers’ mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)

title.en: The Limits of High Specs Marriage: 13 Great Men in a Reality Love Show

altTitles.ja-ro: High Spec Kon ni mo Hodo ga Aru: 13-nin no Ijin-tachi to no Renai Reality Show

altTitles.ja: ハイスペ婚 ほどがある  13人の偉人たちとの恋愛リアリティーショー

description.en: The main character in “Highly Spiced Marriage: Love Reality Show with 13 Greats” is Nao Anegawa, the eldest daughter of a mother-son family who loves her younger siblings who are in the prime of life. On her way home from shopping, she is whisked away to the heavenly realm and forced to appear on “Love Key Man,” a romantic reality show for the gods who have nothing better to do in their spare time. For every one of her male partners, 13 men are gathered from various eras, including Hijikata Toshizo, Friedrich II, Prince Shotoku, Alfred Nobel, and Urahara no Narihira. The ultimate love game with these great men who have left their mark on history begins.

title.en: I Only Want to Beat You

altTitles.en: I Want to Beat You, Oh Roji
I Want to Defeat You, Oh Roji

description.en: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
description.uk: Головний герой Лі Ґіґо, який жодного разу в житті не програв, і головна героїня, яка перемогла його, О Роджі. Хто в підсумку стане переможцем в цьому «парі»?
description.es-la: El protagonista masculino que nunca ha sido derrotado en su vida 'gana', la heroína femenina 'solo' que hizo ese guiño pierde por primera vez ¿Quién será el ganador de esta 'apuesta'?

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr als ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

altTitles.vi: Trên vợ chồng, dưới người yêu

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

description.en:
Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

title.en: Promise In The Night of Fireworks

altTitles.th: คำสัญญาคืนดอกไม้ไฟ

altTitles.en: The Promise of The Fireworks Night

description.en: "Rin" a lonely girl waiting for someone who genuinely cares about her, finally meets "Toey".  Toey's cheerful and charming personality gradually transforms Rin's heart.
Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

title.en: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru

altTitles.ja: 儚いキミは猛攻をはじめる

altTitles.en: The Fairytale-like You Goes on the Assault

altTitles.zh: 童话般的你开始了恋爱猛攻

altTitles.uk: Як у казці починається історія кохання

altTitles.pt-br: Você, como um Conto de Fadas, Parte para o Ataque

description.en: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
description.vi: Một series siêu ngọt nữa tới từ Hazano Kazutake - tác giả của bộ Thánh nữ Cecilia và mục sư Lawrence. Câu chuyện về đôi bạn thưở nhỏ cứ tối đến là lại ở chung nhà để đảm bảo sự an toàn cho nhau...
description.pt-br: Kagari, uma beleza efêmera, reencontra seu amigo de infância mais velho, Nana-kun, e inicia seu ataque romântico contra ele.

altTitles.ja: 可愛い上司を困らせたい

altTitles.en: I Want to Annoy the Pretty Boss

altTitles.pt-br: Quero judiar da minha linda chefinha

altTitles.es: Quiero molestar a mi linda jefa

altTitles.vi: Tôi muốn được chọc ghẹo bà sếp dễ thương của mình

description.en: Ira Megumi is a 31-year-old woman who is currently at the top of her career. She's a beautiful woman who's brimming with pride and totally has no interest in love or marriage. Though the next morning, she wakes up and finds the new employee, Aoki Shun, sleeping next to her. Just what in the world happened?!
description.ja: 井羅恵は31歳の食品会社次長。仕事に全てを捧げ、恋愛や結婚は二の次に。そんな彼女の前に、要領が良い新人男子・青木が現れる。彼の言動にいらつく恵だが、飲み会で酔った挙句、青木と一夜を共にして…。
description.pt-br: Ira Megumi é uma mulher que desistiu de ter uma família ou de agir como uma simples mulher e se dedicou arduamente em seu trabalho, assim chegando ao cargo de vice-diretora em uma grande empresa. Aoki Shun um novato na empresa, amigável, porém desleixado e não parece levar o novo trabalho a sério. Mas algo acontece na festa de boas vindas dos novatos na empresa e Ira acorda ao lado de Aoki na cama… O que diabos aconteceu? Será possível um relacionamento amoroso entre duas pessoas tão diferentes?

description.en: Sayeon Lee despises Aberrants. They wreak havoc on society with their strange, unthinkable powers. It's just too bad she happens to be an Aberrant herself! Forced to fend for her life in the deadly Aberrant Corps, she's determined to make it to the top, and her unusual ability should help her -- if she can figure out how to use it in time.

title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.pl: Kaoru i Rin. Rozkwitając z tobą

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.vi: Những đóa hoa thơm nở diễm kiều

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Au cœur d'une banlieue japonaise, se dressent face à face deux établissements que tout oppose : Chidori, le lycée public pour garçons, réunit les pires cancres de la ville, tandis que le prestigieux Kikyô rassemble les esprits les plus brillants des filles de bonne famille.

Donnant régulièrement un coup de main à la pâtisserie familiale, Rintarô Tsumugi, élève à Chidori, sympathise avec l'une de ses clientes régulières, Kaoruko Waguri. Alors qu'il sent peu à peu un lien se tisser entre eux, le lycéen apprend que la jeune fille fréquente Kikyô et que comme tous les élèves de ces établissements, ils sont supposés se haïr mutuellement ! La rivalité entre leurs lycées est-elle forcément signe de fatalité ?
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en: Even in modern Japan, ninja still hide in the shadows. Young ninja Yodaka has received his mission--protect high school student Aoi at all cost. But can a ninja survive the wild world of high school while also fulfilling his mission?
description.ja: 時は現代！世を忍び悪を討つ公安忍部隊のヨダカは、女子高生・向日アオイの護衛を命じられる。極端にコミュニケーションが苦手なヨダカは目立たず生徒となりアオイを護る予定が、何故か彼女と友達になり!?
description.pt-br: Mesmo no Japão moderno, os ninjas ainda se escondem nas sombras. O jovem ninja Yodaka recebeu sua missão: proteger a estudante do ensino médio Aoi a todo custo. Mas um ninja pode sobreviver ao mundo selvagem do ensino médio e ao mesmo tempo cumprir sua missão?

title.en: One Step Closer to the Demon King

altTitles.id: Aku Raja Lautan tapi jadi Gembel

altTitles.en: Even the Demon King, One Step at a Time
One Step to Being Dark Lord
One Step to the Demon King
One Step for the Dark Lord

description.en:
This is no different from ordinary villager life...
"There can be no one stronger than me in this world!"
To become the strongest, Yuria, the Sea Queen, went ashore in search of the Demon King. But when she looked at her reflection, she saw the face of a child. In exchange for her legs, she lost all her strength... Even so, still striving to become the strongest, Yuria begins a painful journey!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.id:
[ "Hanya saja... aku jadi tidak ada bedanya dengan penduduk desa..." ] "Tidak boleh ada makhluk yang lebih kuat dariku di dunia ini!" Untuk menjadi yang terkuat, Yuria, Raja Lautan, datang ke daratan untuk mencari Raja Iblis terkuat. Namun, saat melihat ke cermin, dia melihat wajah anak kecil...? Sebagai ganti kaki, dia telah kehilangan seluruh kekuatannya. Meskipun begitu, ia masih mengincar posisi teratas di dunia! Perjalanannya yang penuh air mata dimulai!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.ko:
["이건 그냥… 마을 사람 A랑 다를게 없잖아…"]

"나보다 강한 존재는 이 세계에 있을 수 없어!"
세계관 최강자 자리를 위해 지상최강 "마왕"을 찾아
뭍으로 나온 바다의 왕 "유리아" 

그런데… 거울을 보니 웬 어린아이가…?
다리를 얻음과 동시에 
그녀의 모든 힘이 사라져 버렸다...

그럼에도 여전히 세계최강 자리를 노리고 있는
 그녀의 눈물겨운 여정이 시작된다!!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.ru:
Это… Ничем не отличается от деревенской жизни... В этом мире не может быть существа сильнее меня!” Чтобы стать сильнейшей, Юрия, Морская Королева, вышла на сушу в поисках Короля Демонов. Но… Посмотрев на свое отражение, она увидела лицо ребенка... В обмен на ноги она потеряла все свои силы... Даже так, все еще стремясь стать сильнейшей, начинается мучительное путешествие Юрии!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.zh:
深海女王无奈变成小孩？
落魄海王的陆地称霸之旅！
大海之王友丽亚为了称霸天下，特地上岸来到陆地上寻找魔王一决胜负。可上岸后才发现，自己失去了所有的力量，而且还变成了小孩子？为了称霸天下，友丽亚辛酸的崭新旅程就此拉开帷幕！

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)

description.en:
Mirai, a man who does not show his emotions, lives happily with his innocent and cheerful wife Meguru, but he has a "cursed disease" that he keeps secret even from his wife.
Then one day, Mirai receives an important call from the police concerning his wife...!

title.en: Ao no Hana, Utsuwa no Mori

altTitles.ja-ro: Ao no Hana, Utsuwa no Mori

altTitles.en: The Blue Flowers, and the Ceramic Forest

altTitles.th: แต่งเติมลวดลายในรัก

description.en:
Aoko is a ceramic painter at Hasami Wares Pottery, when suddenly an unfriendly and unapproachable man named Tatsuki arrives from overseas. Rejecting her way of life by telling her he isn't interested in painted ceramics, Aoko feels dejected, but can't help but be drawn to Tatsuki's ceramics…  
  
This is a mature love story of a man and woman, both fascinated by ceramics.
description.zh: 青之花 器之森漫画 ，小玉ユキ为大人献上的爱情故事， 陶瓷器与充满坡道的小镇、波佐见—— 对「器」怀着热爱的男女、 在这个小镇相遇…！？

description.en: The stage is the eve of the French Revolution. There is the commoner Gideon, who wants to save the impoverished country side-by-side with the members of the Estates General. Then there is the aristocrat, Georges, who will use any means to achieve his purpose. A man who wants to change the country, and a man who wants to destroy it. Both begin their journey forward. Will their joint efforts of love and hatred, justice and evil lead them to a hell of bloodshed, or an ideal future?

The plot centers on Kazuki Sendo, whose passion and talent for painting and drawing propels him into the world of doujinshi (underground comics). Soon, Kazuki's everyday life is consumed by the fanboy life and his girlfriend is beginning to have some serious doubts about him…  
Sure, his new career as a struggling artist has begun, but at what cost to his friends and family?

One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...

title.en: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンクエスト ダイの大冒険 勇者アバンと獄炎の魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Dragon Quest: Dai no Daibouken - Yuusha Avan to Gokuen no Maou

altTitles.ar: مهمة التنين: مغامة داي الكبرى: البطل افان و جحيم ملك الشياطين المستعر

altTitles.vi: Dragon Quest: Dũng giả Avan và Ngục viêm Ma vương

description.en: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!

title.en: Gun-Ota ga Mahou Sekai ni Tensei shitara, Gendai Heiki de Guntai Harem wo Tsukucchaimashita!?

altTitles.ja: 軍オタが魔法世界に転生したら、現代兵器で軍隊ハーレムを作っちゃいました？！

altTitles.ja-ro: Gunota ga Mahou Sekai ni Tensei Shitara, Gendai Heiki de Guntai Harem o Tsukucchaimashita!?

altTitles.en: When a Gun Nerd Is Reincarnated to a World of Magic, He Established a Harem army with Modern Weapons!?

altTitles.ko: 군대 오타쿠가 마법세계에 환생하여 현대병기로 군할렘을 만들어 버렸습니다!

altTitles.zh: 军武宅转生魔法世界，靠现代武器开军队后宫！？

altTitles.zh-hk: 軍武宅轉生魔法世界，靠現代武器開軍隊後宮!?

altTitles.fr: Quand un fan d'arme est réincarné dans un monde de magie, il établi un Harem avec des armes modernes ?!

altTitles.ru: Когда фанат пушек попал в мир магии, он собрал гарем, вооруженный современным оружием

altTitles.th: กันโอตะได้กลับชาติมาเกิดใหม่ในโลกที่มีเวทมนตร์ เล่ม!?

description.en: Hotta Youta is killed while returning home from work on a cold evening. He wakes up being carried by a bunny-eared woman.
description.ja: 命を落とし、異世界に転生したミリオタ少年は、知識を活かして兵器を製造して戦うことに！前世で叶わなかった想いを胸に、迫り来る魔物から人々を守れ!!! その力で、少年は伝説になる！――かもしれない。
description.pt:
Hotta Youta foi morto enquanto voltava para casa do trabalho em uma noite fria. Ele acordou sendo carregado por uma mulher com orelhas de coelho! Apresentando a reencarnação, armas e harém, é uma história de armas e magia que dá ao nosso protagonista uma nova vida… e um novo começo!   
*Adaptado da web/light novel de mesmo nome.*  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yametakashi)

description.en: After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

altTitles.ja: ファイアーエムブレム エンゲージ

description.en: Ryuuru, a divine dragon in human form, wakes up from a long sleep with no memory. People say that Ryuuru is a hero who fought against an evil dragon that threatened the world 1000 years ago, but... He is confused by the people's reverence and expectations, and the shadows of battle and deception once again loom over him.
description.ja: 人の姿をした神竜・リュールは、記憶を失った状態で長き眠りから目を覚ます。人々はリュールを、1000年前に世界を脅かす邪竜と戦った英雄だと言うが…。期待を込めて崇められ戸惑う彼に、再び戦いと策略の影が迫る――。

description.en:
Not all job classes are created equal!

Marnac was pulled into a game while trying to play as one of its worst job classes, Cleric of Decay. Now he’s the only cleric of the Order of Decay, serving a goddess who’s been reduced to an animated hand that repeats the word “MURDER!”

Will the Order’s last cleric become powerful enough before the prophecy of “the end” comes true?

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

title.en: It Was Just a Contractual Marriage

altTitles.es-la: Fue sólo un matrimonio por contrato

description.en:
The empress of a fallen nation was dragged to the enemy empire. Despite everything, the Treasure of Grandel was still gorgeous. However, in the end she was just a captive who was going to be hanged by the savages. Eliza wanted to avoid that outcome no matter what, even if she had to tell outrageous lies. There was only one option: the man known as Banella's guard dog, the enemy empire's commander, and a lowly and vicious warrior—Lezet Christian. Eliza had to convince this cold and obstinate man who stood before her.

In a trembling voice, she said, "I'll give you a child."
description.pl:
Księżniczka z pokonanego kraju przywieziona do wrogiego, skarb Grandela, piękna nawet w chwili upadku.
Jednak nadal jest więźniarką, która wkrótce zostanie powieszona i przedstawiona barbarzyńcom.
Elise próbowała uciec przed tym losem i spróbować żyć.
Nawet jeśli wypowie absurdalne kłamstwo.
Jest tylko jedna możliwość.
Pies Banyella, głównodowodzący wrogiego państwa.
Do tego dziki smok, Rezette Kyrstan.
Elysee musiała przekonać tego zimnego, upartego człowieka na swoich oczach.
Drżącym głosem powiedziała.
"Urodzę twoje dziecko".

altTitles.ja: 三億円事件奇譚 モンタージ

description.en:
One day, 10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato, and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."  
Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later, Yamato's father is found dead, and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident, but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later, Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents, and resolves to take action.

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.th: วันธรรมดาของแม่มดว้าวุ่น

description.en:
Kowata Makoto is an airhead with a bad sense of direction who just moved into her relative's house… 
but is that all?  

Note: The Oneshot was originally published under a different pen name (Ishioka Chikai).  


---

**Links:**
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=17448)
- [Official Korean (Lezhin)](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/flying_witch)

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%B5%E3%82%89%E3%81%84%E3%82%93%E3%81%90%E3%81%86%E3%81%83%E3%81%A3%E3%81%A1)
description.pt-br: Makoto Kowata é uma bruxa aprendiz de Yokohama que, ao completar 15 anos, se muda para Aomori, no interior do Japão, para morar com seus tios e desenvolver seus poderes. Acompanhada de sua gata Chito, Makoto terá que se adaptar à nova vida, à escola, aos amigos e descobrir que a magia está presente em pequenas coisas.

title.en: Choujigen Game Neptune: The Animation - Hello New World - Yuusha Hon

altTitles.en: Hyperdimension Neptunia: The Animation - Hello New World - Hero Book

altTitles.ja: 超次元ゲイム ネプテューヌ はろーにゅーわーるど 勇者本 (書籍)

description.en:
Azumi is a manga series that concerns a young woman brought up as part of a team of assassins, charged with killing three warlords that threaten Feudal Japan with an agenda of war and bloodshed.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Website](http://www.yu-koyama.com)  
- [Live-Action Movie on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6166)  
- [Live-Action Movie (sequel) on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6167)

In the Kingdom of Wardell Ceram, a realm rich in flowers and trees, the charming duo of Luca and Sylvain live outside the law. As the Wolf Claws, they are a chivalrous thieves who target those nobles who commit evil deeds. Their deeds bring them to the attention of the Kingdom's Princess, who wants to recruit them for a very special task. A romantic comedy about love that transcends class!
description.pt-br: Esta história se passa em Wardell Ceram, um país de flores e árvores. Luka e Sylvan, os "Garras de Lobo", agem como ladrões justiceiros que roubam aristocratas do mal. Um dia, a princesa do reino pede a eles para ajudá-la a reprimir nobres corruptos.

description.en: Qi, swords, martial artists… and robots and spaceships?! The year is 3077, thousands of years after the heyday of the martial arts realm. Humanity inhabits the stars, governed by interstellar martial arts organizations who kept the old ways of the realm alive: might makes right! For bounty hunters like Seryeong, Robert, and Sunja, this means trouble is good for business, except when they bite off more than they can chew. After venturing to the irradiated wasteland of Earth for a top bounty, only to find a 2,000-year-old martial artist instead, they realize their fortunes are about to change…

title.en: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.ja: クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Gyaru ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.en: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air

altTitles.id: Aku Dianggap Seolah-olah Udara Oleh Gadis Gyaru Di Kelas

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas de mi clase me tratan como el aire

altTitles.vi: Mấy nhỏ Gyaru trong lớp tôi đối xử tôi như không khí

altTitles.ja: 愛乃ななの計画 クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています

altTitles.ja-ro: Aino Nana no Keikaku: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.en: Nana Aino's Plan: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air

description.en:
A boy named Ryuuji Aizawa is getting treated by his gyaru classmates like he wasn't there, like this girl named Nana Aino who sits on his seat. With him still in it.

---

Note: 
Released as a free ebook compilation on Amazon under the title: *Aino Nana no Keikaku: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu (愛乃ななの計画 クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています)* "Nana Aino's Plan: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air"; Volume 1 contains chapters 1-24 including some new textless illustrations.

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Tranquillity650/status/1721818260436644142)
description.es-la: Un par de gals parecen no notar al chico delante de ellas.

description.en:
Following the life of the student newspaper reporter Emiko, these are scary stories of experiences from Miyako High School :  
- Ubawareta Shinzou (Stolen Heart) – The school's mystery club sees the dangerous consequences of an innocent promise concerning heart donation after death between two friends.   
- Kyuuketsu Men (Bloodsucking Mask) – A girl who wears a demon mask from a shrine for a bad-luck-banishing drama club party ends up unable to remove it.   
- Dokuga (Poison Moth) – The science club leader creates a serum to preserve dead bodies perfectly, but it may have other unpredicted side effects.   
- Henshitsu – A couple take shelter from a storm in a strange house with a secret that might prove to be deadly.   
– These stories and many more are found in the two volumes of Kyoufu. [tethysdust]

After losing her mother early on, Hotaru, a girl surrounded by warmth and tranquility, finds her life taking a dramatic turn. An unexpected event draws her into the world of “Goze”, setting her on a path through unknown lands with music as her guide. Armed with her talent and a heart full of questions, she embarks on a quest, seeking her missing father and her true calling…!
description.pt-br: Depois de perder a mãe muito cedo, Hotaru, uma garota cercada de calor e tranquilidade, vê sua vida tomar um rumo dramático. Um evento inesperado a leva ao mundo de “Goze”, colocando-a em um caminho por terras desconhecidas, tendo a música como guia. Dotada por seu talento e com o coração cheio de perguntas, ela embarca em uma jornada em busca de seu pai desaparecido e de sua verdadeira vocação...!

title.en: Tsuihou Yuusha no Yuugana Slow Life: Jiyuu ni Nattara Ore Dake no Saiai Tenshi no Te ni Haitta!

altTitles.en: The Elegant Life of the Exiled Hero: When I Became Free, I Also Gained My Beloved Angel!

altTitles.ja: 追放勇者の優雅な生活 ～自由になったら俺だけの最愛天使も手に入った！～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihō Yūsha no Yūgana Seikatsu (Slow Life) ～Jiyū ni Nattara Ore Dake no Saiai Tenshi no Te ni Haitta!～

description.en:
After suddenly being fired despite serving as a hero for 30 years, Alec was left with nowhere to turn. Orphaned from a young age, he had no parents to rely on, and having been a hero since childhood, he lacked basic common sense. With nowhere else to go, Alec ends up at an unexpected place—a slave market!?

There, he encounters the beautiful and kind-hearted Lyrishia.

This is the story of an unwittingly strongest protagonist and an angelic heroine weaving an excessively naughty second life together.

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス

altTitles.en: Stray Dogs of the Literary Masters

description.en: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically attempting suicide. That man is Dazai Osamu, and he and his partner Kunikida are members of a very special detective agency. They have supernatural powers, and deal with cases that are too dangerous for the police or the military. They're tracking down a tiger that has appeared in the area recently, around the time Atsushi came to the area. The tiger seems to have a connection to Atsushi, and by the time the case is solved, it is clear that Atsushi's future will involve much more of Dazai and the rest of the detectives!
description.ru: Нашего героя выгнали из детского дома. Стоя у реки, он думал о голодной смерти, но чудом умудрился спасти самоубийцу. Этот человек, оказалось, состоит в детективном агентстве. В агентстве со сверхъестественными способностями. И только им подвластно решение проблем, за которые боятся браться даже военные. Теперь жизнь нашего героя изменится кардинально. А как именно читайте далее.

description.en:
The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

title.en: A Red Laurel To My Emperor

altTitles.zh-hk: 為我的皇帝獻上紅月桂花

altTitles.en: Red Laurel Flowers to My Emperor

description.en: Laurel Neales, the first princess of Tortia, has been married off to the emperor of Kairos following a political feud that ended with the assassination of her parents. Undiscouraged by the circumstances, Laurel refuses to give in to becoming yet another of the emperor's concubines. Instead, she plays along with his romantic whims and gains her own form of power in this new life by proposing an offer he cannot refuse: to facilitate his conquest of the land that betrayed her.

title.en: Let's Take a Walk in Another World

description.en:
Ordinary student Sora has been summoned to another world as one of seven "chosen heroes" meant to battle the Demon King. While the other six are blessed with grandiose titles and superlative stats, Sora is stuck with no title, no level, and a single, underwhelming skill: he never gets tired from walking. After being judged useless to the cause, Sora is thrown out into the streets and left to fend for himself. Nevertheless, he grows determined to turn his unjust treatment and seemingly "useless" skill into a positive by earning money, making friends, and seeing sights he's never seen before!
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/isekai-walking)
description.ja: 異世界に召喚された少年ソラは、勇者として魔王と戦うことを命じられる。しかし与えられた「ウォーキング」スキルの効果は、どんなに歩いても疲れないだけ! 国王から見放され、追放されたソラであったが、一度異世界へ足を踏み出すと突然レベルアップ!? 実は「ウォーキング」には「1歩進むごとに経験値１を獲得する」という隠し効果があったのだ!! その経験値で様々なスキルを獲得、歩くごとに万能となっていくソラは、のんびり気ままな異世界の旅へと歩み出す!!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

altTitles.vi: Tối Cường Phản Sáo Lộ Hệ Thống

description.en:
Scamming all day, every day, often venturing alone. He bluffs to get the ultimate power in this cultivation world?! world traveler Xue Que doesn’t always bluff, but he needs to.  
  
"Before you get your hopes up, The Character is Absolute Garbage, The Manhua is Pure comedy at best… The plot ehhh not so much"  
  
Term : META Stands for (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming is any strategy, action or method used in a game which transcends a prescribed ruleset, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game. Another definition refers to the game universe outside of the game itself. *(citation needed)*
description.fr:
Escroquer toute la journée, tous les jours, souvent en s'aventurant seul. Il bluffe pour obtenir le pouvoir ultime dans ce monde de culture ! Le voyageur du monde Xue Que ne bluffe pas toujours, mais il en a besoin.

Terme : META signifie (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming est la stratégie, l'action ou la méthode utilisée dans un jeu qui transcende un ensemble de règles prescrit, utilise des facteurs externes pour affecter le jeu, ou va au-delà des limites supposées ou l'environnement établi par le jeu. Une autre définition fait référence à l'univers du jeu en dehors du jeu lui-même.

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

altTitles.th: คุณอันโจ หยอกนักเพราะรักนะ

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?

**Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal)
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

altTitles.th: ALTAIR ดาวจรัสฟ้า อินทรีถลาลม

altTitles.vi: Sao Thiên Ưng trên bầu trời Tướng quốc

description.en:
For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins…  

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10291/episode/324757) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/altair-a-record-of-battles/)

**Notes:**
- Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Awards in the shounen category.
